segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman is while drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even seem to notice the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is soaked, but she just keeps on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is going to fall off that stool if he's not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her share, completely focused on the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene, it's a stark contrast to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the water or the children's antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and it's making me nervous just looking at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel the anticipation building, something is bound to happen soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are so engrossed in their mission, they don't care about anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope everyone stays safe in this chaotic kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
